i think that while it's appropriate for the police department to invite video reports of wrong doing both by ordinary people and police officers the new york police department has a long way to go to ensure that police officers who engage in wrongdoing like what was captured in the two video tapes that were recently disclosed are held accountable

i think that people that put themselves up have sufficient confidence in their ability and sufficient confidence in their vision for policing not to be too intimidated by the more ridiculous assertions of some of the press if you take the press personally you're dead
